INSERT INTO tbl_make_step (step_no, hobby_no, make_step_num, make_step_text, make_step_img, tip, note, link_url, link_desc) SELECT seq_step_no.nextval, A.* FROM (
select #{item.hobby_no} HOBBY_NO, #{item.make_step_num} MAKE_STEP_NUM, #{item.make_step_text} MAKE_STEP_TEXT, #{item.make_step_img, jdbcType=VARCHAR} MAKE_STEP_IMG, #{item.tip, jdbcType=VARCHAR} TIP, #{item.note, jdbcType=VARCHAR} NOTE, #{item.link_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR} LINK_URL, #{item.link_desc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} LINK_DESC from dual ) A

INSERT INTO tbl_hobby_material (hm_no, hobby_no, material_no, material_detail, seq) SELECT seq_hm_no.nextval, A.* FROM (
select #{item.hobby_no} HOBBY_NO, #{item.material_no} MATERIAL_NO, #{item.material_detail, jdbcType=VARCHAR} MATERIAL_DETAIL, #{item.seq} SEQ from dual ) A

INSERT INTO tbl_complete_img (cimg_no, hobby_no, img_name, num) SELECT seq_cimg_no.nextval, A.* FROM (
select #{item.hobby_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} HOBBY_NO, #{item.img_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} IMG_NAME, #{item.num, jdbcType=VARCHAR} NUM from dual ) A
